Package com.att.research.xacml.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XACMLPolicyScanner.Callback
    This is a simple callback interface that can be implemented and passed to the XACMLPolicyScanner.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttributeUtils  
    CalendarTest  
    FactoryFinder
    FactoryFinder is a utility for finding various XACML Factory objects using a common search procedure: 1.
    ListUtil
    ListUtil contains a number of useful utilities on java Collection objects.
    ObjUtil
    ObjUtil provides utilities for comparing objects in various circumstances.
    StringUtils
    StringUtils provides utilities for converting various general classes of objects to strings.
    Wrapper<T>
    Defines an object that delegates its equals, hashCode and toString methods to a wrapped object.
    XACMLObjectCopy  
    XACMLPolicyAggregator
    This class extends the SimpleCallback class and aggregates specific data items in a policy.
    XACMLPolicyScanner
    class XACMLPolicyScanner This class traverses the hierarchy of a XACML 3.0 policy.
    XACMLPolicyScanner.SimpleCallback
    This is a simple implementation of the Callback.
    XACMLPolicyWriter
    Helper static class for policy writing.
    XACMLProperties
    XACMLProperties is a wrapper around a Properties object loaded from a standard location for XACML properties.
    XACMLRepair
    XACMLRepair is an application class that can load individual XACML documents or directories of XACML documents, make any needed repairs on them, and write them back out to an output file or directory.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    XACMLPolicyScanner.CallbackResult
    Very simple enumeration used in the callback class.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FactoryException
